title: LF GOLD + PLAYERS FOR THE OPEN LADDER
body:
Was looking to get a semi-serious team together to play in some of these online tournaments. I want to try and take it some what seriosuly even though I know our chances of making it through are astronomical. In saying that though, it would be a fun thing to do for the next few weeks, as im sure a lot of us are on holidays (YEAH) ! Leave your dets here and ill add you in game... My IGN is Original Chief but that might be changing soon. WE ARE MOSTLY LOOKING FOR A TOP AND MID LANER !!

Summoner Name:

Division:

Age:

Role:

Championpool for the role:

Do you have skype?

Can you play ranked 5s everynight?
